rules_text:
Flying
{2}{W}, Sacrifice Herald of the Departed: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
flavor_text: [i]“The Father lied. Our ancestors aren't in Heaven. He trapped them here. Forgotten. Now, they ride within me, and no one will forget them again.”[/i]
notes:
CRCWUCMC1

“Ivenge never gave them Heaven. He just paved over them. Forgot them. Tonight, I won't let anyone forget.”
